inclusion.criterion: High index of suspicion of locally resectable or borderline resectable pancreatic or periampullary (= duodenal, papilla of Vater or distal bile duct) cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Previous treatment for the pancreatic or periampullary cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Contraindications for USPIO based contrast agents (allergy, hereditary hemochromatosis, thalassemia, sickle cell anemia)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 45-year-old postmenopausal woman with cytologically confirmed breast cancer. Candidate for tumor resection and agrees to do so prior to chemotherapy.
